sections.title: About Me
sections.content: I am passionate about staying up to date with the latest technologies, believing they lead to more efficient and reliable software solutions. I view new challenges as opportunities for both technical and personal growth. Eager to learn new methodologies and frameworks, I am focused on building my career in software engineering, with a particular interest in backend development. However, I am open to exploring other areas as well. You can find my personal projects on my GitHub profile, showcasing my continuous learning and development.
